snippet.title: [4K] Project Buramato - early Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
[PRE-ALPHA FOOTAGE | WORK IN PROGRESS]

Targeted to be in development until the end of 2022.

PLAYTEST THE PROTOTYPE IN Q4-2021 [JOIN OUR DISCORD]
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1726560/Project_Buramato/

Don't forget to wishlist and follow our steam pages, We are about to start a new adventure!

PROJECT BURAMATO is a fast-paced semi open-world 3D Action-Adventure video game in which you can traverse the ancient lands of the old lords. 

Absorb and manipulate the power of the dark curse in beautiful high fantasy settings of traditional Bornean folktales.

[*] 3D Action platformer video games in high fantasy settings of traditional Bornean folktales.
[*] Play the game in fast-paced Third-person action.
[*] Open Interpretation in storytelling, focused more on Atmosphere.
[*] Fight mythical creatures on magic-focused action-shooter gameplay. 
[*] Explore the vast open environment with our smooth traversal system  
[*] Explore and traverse the land of the old lords in beautiful semi-open world environments.

Visit: http://ozysoft.net/project-buramato/

COMMUNITY CORNER 
join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/3CNdrYM3zf

Follow OZYSOFT in STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35288501

More on Ozysoft :
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Ozysoft/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/Ozysoft
IG : https://www.instagram.com/ozysoft/

#GameLokal #Indonesia #Borneo #games #Steam #console #playstation5 #xbox #projectBuramato 

Music used: Luminous Sky - By Noonsool
